name: EDM DANCE MUSIC MAKER AND DUBSTEP CREATOR
name_original: EDM DANCE MUSIC MAKER AND DUBSTEP CREATOR
description:
Electronic music mixing and making app for the ipad.
Use sliders to adjust volume and fade from one beat to the next. Then use our FX pad to create stunning one shots and awesome drops.

Impress all your friends with live performance style mixing.

Thank you for downloading, we appreciate you.
